abstract: On a low-rated night of network television in prime time, the finale of ABC’s two-week revival of “Who Wants to be a Millionaire” eked out a victory as Sunday’s most watched show.
snippet: On a low-rated night of network television in prime time, the finale of ABC’s two-week revival of “Who Wants to be a Millionaire” eked out a victory as Sunday’s most watched show.
lead_paragraph: On a low-rated night of network television in prime time, the finale of ABC’s two-week revival of “Who Wants to be a Millionaire” eked out a victory as Sunday’s most-watched show. According to Nielsen’s estimates, 7.6 million viewers tuned in to the game show’s last episode at 8 p.m.

headline.main: Sunday Ratings: ‘Millionaire’ Finale Tops the Night
